attributes.action: Let Diana be dead and let her life be a joyful memory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just let Diana, the Princess of Wales rest in piece. Stop analyzing everything to do with her life as she will still be dead at the end of it. Stop the court case to see if she was murdered or not. It is going over too much ground.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
